original_text:
I did not send these prophets,
    yet they have run with their message;
I did not speak to them,
    yet they have prophesied.
korean_text: 이 선지자들은 내가 보내지 아니하였어도 달음질하며 내가 그들에게 이르지 아니하였어도 예언하였은즉

sentences.original_text: I did not send these prophets
yet they have run with their message
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 그들은 그들의 메시지를 가지고 달려갔다

sentences.original_text: I did not speak to them
